Hi Jim:
 Good. I was worried that the recent deaths at the NBTHK might throw a
monkey wrench into his plans.
 I have volunteered to Gordon to be a dog's body if I can be helpful in
the shinsa room as I am not having a table.
 Stuart B has told me in two letters how pleased he was to see your
really top drawer material. Sounds wonderful.
 Regards,
Arnold Frenzel

>>> jggilbert@... 06/28/04 2:08 PM >>>
Hi Arnold,
He will be there.  It'll be about the same lineup as in the recent
overseas shinsa in Jersey City and London.

Jim



  Hi Jim:
  Can you confirm that Hagihara sensei will still be doing the kodogu at
  Chicago? It matters a lot to me in terms of what I bring. Thank you.
  Arnold afrenzel@...
